meanings.definition: A skiing race over a long distance, often in difficult terrain.
meanings.sent1: During the loppet, skiers raced through the snowy mountains.
meanings.sent2: The annual loppet attracted many participants from around the region.
meanings.sent3: The loppet turned into a friendly competition between friends.
meanings.sent4: Her determination in the loppet was like a blazing fire.
meanings.sent5: The loppet was a true test of endurance and skill.

meanings.definition: To ski in a loppet race.
meanings.sent1: She trained hard to loppet through the challenging course.
meanings.sent2: Many enthusiasts loppet every winter to challenge themselves.
meanings.sent3: He decided to loppet despite his fear of falling.
meanings.sent4: Her graceful movements loppeting down the slope were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: Loppeting through the snow-covered forest was exhilarating.

meanings.sent1: The loppet brought together skiers of all ages for a fun day.
meanings.sent2: Participants eagerly awaited the start of the loppet.
meanings.sent3: The loppet was filled with laughter and cheers.
meanings.sent4: The atmosphere at the loppet was electric with excitement.
meanings.sent5: Winning the loppet was a dream come true for the young skier.
